content.rendered:
Inspired by the Dulux Color project, I remembered a post I’d seen on Little Green Notebook. It looks like Jenny got the original floorplan from either the building or her real estate broker, and then used them to make color studies for her apartment. These lovely scrappy little floorplans show a really easy way to bring the benefits of scale and proportion to color in a space.

( both floorplans via littlegreennotebook)
